answers.answer: hi and welcome to our forum? do you know what u r having yet?
Yes, I am having another little boy. =)

Goodness they did bump you up! Well welcome to our little community! I'm sure team blue will like the add! LOL We are in compitition and team pink has been in the lead, looks like team blue might pull up from behind!!
Yeah, he keeps showing a little bigger each u/s. Eeekk probably cause of my gestational diabetes. =(
Welcome!  Yay for team Blue!...or should I say green?  For some reason I seem to be buying a heck of a lot of green stuff!  ;-)

I'm surprised how they will keep changing your due date.  They told my daughter that they will not change it after the first u/s.   She went for her 20 week, which she was 21weeks 1day according to first u/s and when i was watching the screen all measurements kept saying GA 22weeks 3days but the tech said the doctor will not change the due date from the first u/s.  What was your orginal due date?  and what is it now?
Welcome fawngonzalez!  We'll gladly accept a Blue Teamer, lol!!!

question: Hi Ladies,I am joining your group as it looks like they keep bumping my due date up so I just might have a May baby. I just wanted to say hello to all of you mommies. =)
title: Hi Ladies
